metadata.description: Cross-platform firewall rule comparison showing how rules are implemented across AWS, Azure, GCP, and Palo Alto

comparisons.description: Allow HTTPS inbound to web servers from internet
Allow PostgreSQL access from application tier to database
Allow Redis access from web and application tiers

Allow CDN edge servers to pull from origin

Block RDP access from internet

Allow Grafana dashboard access from VPN

Allow all traffic between EKS worker nodes

Allow log forwarding to Splunk HEC
Allow container nodes to pull images from registry
Block traffic from known Tor exit nodes
